name: NinjaTerror-ArtJam-JasonMckay
description:
NinjaTerror is a 2D Endless Runner where you are being pursued by a ninja trying to kill you in the middle of the night and you must keep running away to stay alive.

Here are the instructions on how to play:

  • Press "spacebar" to jump.
    • Your character moves to the right automatically.
  • Icicle attacks or "Icepicks" will be sent towards you rudimentary.
    • Use the jump mechanic to avoid the attacks.
    • If the icicle hits you, it will briefly stun you and then reduce your movement speed.
  • The ninja stalks behind.
    • If the ninja catches up to you it is instant game over.

With what you have learned above, are you able to avoid the terror of a ninja? Let's find out!

Download and Installation Instructions:

  • Click the zip file to download.
  • Once downloaded, unzip the file and then open the Brief 1- Art Jam by Jason McKay file.
